name: Digital Fridge
tag_list: app, mobile, iphone, ipad, android, droid, mobility, photo, photography, video, audio, notes, text, social, social-media, twitter, facebook, assets, digital, interactive, technology, denver, colorado
overview:
Capture, Search, Share…Digital Fridge is the next step in managing your photos, videos, audio, notes and check-ins. Launching this fall, Digital Fridge will help you remember when…

Company Overview Founded in Denver, CO. This company was built to help people manage their photos, videos, audio, notes and check-ins. It was designed to be the next step in digital asset management.

Led by a team of amazing people, our hope is to help you Capture your assets in a way that allows you to easily Search for them and Share them with your friends and family.

Description The fridge has always been the hub for the family in the home and your Digital Fridge will become your new online hub for your friends and family.

Your Fridge will help you Capture, Search and Share more easily. It will provide a way to organize and easily find your memories. And will provide a way for non-digital assets (kids drawings, birthday/anniversary cards, newspaper clippings, etc…) to be easily digitized and stored.

Digital Fridge…Remember When

milestones.description: Announced the appointment of Peter Lynch as the CEO
